kit.leader_skill: Extreme PHY Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +120%

super_attack.name: Grand Smasher (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Greatly lowers DEF; Raises Extreme Class allies'; DEF by 30% for 2 turns

passive_skill.name: Pressure of Savage Power
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 170% up; The more HP remaining: ATK up (up to 200%); When attacking: ATK & DEF 100% up; Disables the enemy's guard; Per "Space-Traveling Warriors" Category ally or Extreme Class ally on the team (depending on which has more members): ATK & DEF 40% up; All allies' chance of performing a critical hit 3% up (self excluded); When all allies are "Space-Traveling Warriors" Category characters or Extreme Class characters: Performs a critical hit; Guards all attacks; All allies' Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 30% up (self excluded)
